title: Can I write JEE Mains and advanced exam after completing 1st year in engineering? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, you can write JEE advanced for two consecutive years. If you had written jee Advanced last year, you can write this year. But,if you've written JEE advanced before last year, you can't write this year. One more condition for jee advanced is you should not be a student of any IIT. Once go through the eligibility criteria for jee Advanced in jee advanced official website.
